titles.title: Simon Wiesenthal Holocaust Education Assistance Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Education to make grants to educational organizations to carry out educational programs about the Holocaust.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3613)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary:
3/22/2007--Introduced.
Simon Wiesenthal Holocaust Education Assistance Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make competitive grants to educational organizations to carry out educational programs about the Holocaust.
